creator: eli
title: cheesecake
steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F.
Mix milk, cream cheese and sugar.
Add eggs one at a time, blending well.
Add vanilla and flour
Bake for 60 minutes, or until cake jiggles evenly across the top when lightly shaken.

creator: realsimple.com
title: honey bruschetta
steps: Thinly slice the baguette.
Place the rounds on a baking sheet and broil until golden brown (about 1 1/2 minutes per side)
Divide the blue cheese among the toasted bread slices.
Drizzle 2 tablespoons honey evenly over them.

creator: panera
title: lemonade
ingredients: 20 lemons or 3 cups fresh lemon juice
steps: Stir sugar in lemon juice until dissolved
Stir in the water
Optional: stir in honey
Add some ice, and it is ready to serve!

creator: cherrie
title: blueberry muffins
steps: Mix ingredients
Bake in oven

creator: amy
title: pasta
ingredients: 8 ounces bacon coarse salt and ground pepper
steps: Set a large pot of water to boil (for pasta).
In a large skillet, cook bacon over medium heat until crisp (around 8-12 minutes)
Salt boil pasta and cook until al dente
in a large bowl, whisk together eggs, Parmesan, and half-and-half
Drain pasta and add to egg mixture. Add bacon; season with salt and pepper.
